channel.title: O0 on Mryqu's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in O0 on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: [算法] O(0)的exch函数
item.description: 常用的exch函数： public static void exch(int[] nums, int i, int j) { int tmp = nums[i]; nums[i] = nums[j]; nums[j] = tmp; } 不使用辅助空间的exch函数： public static void exch(int[] nums, int i, int j) { nums[i] ^= nums[j]; nums[j] ^= nums[i]; nums[i] ^= nums[j]; } 控制流及nums[i]和nums[j]状态如下： |nums[i]|nums[j] |— |= nums[i] ^ nums[j]|/ |/|= nums[j] ^ (nums[i] ^ nums[j]) = nums[i] |= (nums[i] ^ nums[j]) ^ nums[i] = nums[j]|/
